trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL128_00642_SEQ_00<tab>Sister Airell of the Church of Saint Adama Landama has her hands full with the Order's work.
TEXT_SUBWIL128_00642_SEQ_01<tab>There are too many graves for Sister Airell to tend to in a timely manner. Gather six old offerings from graves in her stead.
TEXT_SUBWIL128_00642_SEQ_02<tab>You have gathered the old offerings from the graves. Report back to Sister Airell at the church.
TEXT_SUBWIL128_00642_SEQ_03<tab>It seems Sister Airell still has some straightening up to do around the church. Speak to her once more for another task.
TEXT_SUBWIL128_00642_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the old offerings to Sister Airell.
TEXT_SUBWIL128_00642_AIRELL_000_1<tab>Be welcome to the Church of Saint Adama Landama. I am Sister Airell.
TEXT_SUBWIL128_00642_AIRELL_000_2<tab>I gather you are on no pilgrimage. You look to be an adventurer. If so, might I impose on you to help tend the lichyard while you are here with us?
TEXT_SUBWIL128_00642_AIRELL_000_3<tab>The graves here far outnumber we who keep them. Alone, we cannot possibly do all that needs be done.
TEXT_SUBWIL128_00642_AIRELL_000_4<tab>Would you see to gathering up the old offerings currently lying about outside? I made note of at least six during my last rounds through the yard.
TEXT_SUBWIL128_00642_AIRELL_000_10<tab>Were you able to gather the old offerings?

TEXT_SUBWIL128_00642_AIRELL_000_11<tab>Thank you. <sigh> Would that there were naught else to be done. I must see to collecting the weathered vases, urns, and ewers before long. The dead sleep soundest in a tidy grave.
TEXT_SUBWIL128_00642_AIRELL_000_12<tab>I have no shortage of work to offer, should you care to take it. Speak to me again whensoever you feel so compelled.
